revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDR3800 |upc=606449078206 |asin=B0058NN6CS |est_release_date=2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY308300092 |ic_id=4054A-08300092 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU5162ETR-E3C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, internal,, 14-pad header,, J2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, J1,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366SR |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=DFS |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, libreCMC, CeroWrt, Gargoyle |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX,NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,,^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=20:4E:7F, 2C:B0:5D |oui_eth=20:4E:7F, 2C:B0:5D }} {{TagLine|N600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/wirelessrouters/high-performance/wndr3800.aspx Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNDR3800|vs_id=18163}}
The device has the same FCC ID as the WNDR3700v1/v2.
Per the below DD-WRT forums post, the Flash and RAM has been
doubled to 16MB (same as the WNDR3700v2) and 128MB, respectively. {{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNDR3800}} ==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr3800 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31610-netgear-wndr3800-n600-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-premium-edition-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/135-netgear-wndr3800.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] :OUI: 20:4E:7F (ETH + WLAN) :SSID: ''NETGEARXX'' + ''NETGEARXX-5G'' :Guest SSID: ''NETGEAR-Guest'' and ''NETGEAR-5G-Guest'' ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=85519 On the DD-WRT forums] __NOTOC__
